A

ActiveInformationCalculatorDiscrete - Class in infodynamics.measures.discrete
Active Information Storage calculator for univariate discrete (int[]) data.
ActiveInformationCalculatorDiscrete(int, int) - Constructor for class infodynamics.measures.discrete.ActiveInformationCalculatorDiscrete
Construct a new instance
ActiveInfoStorageCalculator - Interface in infodynamics.measures.continuous
Interface for implementations of Active Information Storage estimators on continuous univariate data (ie double[] arrays).
ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorGaussian - Class in infodynamics.measures.continuous.gaussian
An Active Information Storage (AIS) calculator (implementing ActiveInfoStorageCalculator) which is affected using a Gaussian Mutual Information (MI) calculator (MutualInfoCalculatorMultiVariateGaussian) to make the calculations.
ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorGaussian() - Constructor for class infodynamics.measures.continuous.gaussian.ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorGaussian
Creates a new instance of the Gaussian-estimate style active info storage calculator
ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorKernel - Class in infodynamics.measures.continuous.kernel
An Active Information Storage (AIS) calculator (implementing ActiveInfoStorageCalculator) which is affected using a box-kernel Mutual Information (MI) calculator (MutualInfoCalculatorMultiVariateKernel) to make the calculations.
ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorKernel() - Constructor for class infodynamics.measures.continuous.kernel.ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorKernel
Creates a new instance of the box-kernel estimator for AIS
ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorKraskov - Class in infodynamics.measures.continuous.kraskov
An Active Information Storage (AIS) calculator (implementing ActiveInfoStorageCalculator) which is affected using a Kraskov-Stoegbauer-Grassberger (KSG) Mutual Information (MI) calculator (MutualInfoCalculatorMultiVariateKraskov) to make the calculations.
ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorKraskov() - Constructor for class infodynamics.measures.continuous.kraskov.ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorKraskov
Creates a new instance of the Kraskov-Stoegbauer-Grassberger style AIS calculator.
ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorKraskov(String) - Constructor for class infodynamics.measures.continuous.kraskov.ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorKraskov
Creates a new instance of the Kraskov-Stoegbauer-Grassberger estimator for AIS, with the supplied MI calculator name.
ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorKraskov(int) - Constructor for class infodynamics.measures.continuous.kraskov.ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorKraskov
Creates a new instance of the Kraskov-Stoegbauer-Grassberger estimator for AIS, with the supplied Kraskov-Stoegbauer-Grassberger MI algorithm number
ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorMultiVariate - Interface in infodynamics.measures.continuous
Interface for implementations of Active Information Storage estimators on multivariate continuous time-series data.
ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorMultiVariateGaussian - Class in infodynamics.measures.continuous.gaussian
An Active Information Storage (AIS) calculator for multivariate time-series data (implementing ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorMultiVariate) which is affected using a Gaussian Mutual Information (MI) calculator (MutualInfoCalculatorMultiVariateGaussian) to make the calculations.
ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorMultiVariateGaussian() - Constructor for class infodynamics.measures.continuous.gaussian.ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorMultiVariateGaussian
Creates a new instance of the Gaussian-estimate style active info storage calculator
ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorMultiVariateKernel - Class in infodynamics.measures.continuous.kernel
An Active Information Storage (AIS) calculator for multivariate time-series data (implementing ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorMultiVariate) which is affected using a box-kernel Mutual Information (MI) calculator (MutualInfoCalculatorMultiVariateKernel) to make the calculations.
ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorMultiVariateKernel() - Constructor for class infodynamics.measures.continuous.kernel.ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorMultiVariateKernel
Creates a new instance of the box-kernel estimator for AIS
ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorMultiVariateKraskov - Class in infodynamics.measures.continuous.kraskov
An Active Information Storage (AIS) calculator for multivariate time-series data (implementing ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorMultiVariate) which is affected using a Kraskov-Stoegbauer-Grassberger (KSG) Mutual Information (MI) calculator (MutualInfoCalculatorMultiVariateKraskov) to make the calculations.
ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorMultiVariateKraskov() - Constructor for class infodynamics.measures.continuous.kraskov.ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorMultiVariateKraskov
Creates a new instance of the Kraskov-Stoegbauer-Grassberger style AIS calculator.

Creates a new instance of the Kraskov-Stoegbauer-Grassberger estimator for AIS, with the supplied MI calculator name.

ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorMultiVariateViaMutualInfo - Class in infodynamics.measures.continuous
An Active Information Storage (AIS) calculator (implementing ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorMultiVariate) which is affected using a given Mutual Information (MI) calculator (implementing MutualInfoCalculatorMultiVariate) to make the calculations.
ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorMultiVariateViaMutualInfo(String) - Constructor for class infodynamics.measures.continuous.ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorMultiVariateViaMutualInfo
Construct using an instantiation of the named MI calculator
ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorMultiVariateViaMutualInfo(Class<MutualInfoCalculatorMultiVariate>) - Constructor for class infodynamics.measures.continuous.ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorMultiVariateViaMutualInfo
Construct using an instantiation of the given MI class
ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorMultiVariateViaMutualInfo(MutualInfoCalculatorMultiVariate) - Constructor for class infodynamics.measures.continuous.ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorMultiVariateViaMutualInfo
Construct using the given (constructed but not initialised) MI calculator.
ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorViaMutualInfo - Class in infodynamics.measures.continuous
An Active Information Storage (AIS) calculator (implementing ActiveInfoStorageCalculator) which is affected using a given Mutual Information (MI) calculator (implementing MutualInfoCalculatorMultiVariate) to make the calculations.

ChiSquareMeasurementDistribution - Class in infodynamics.utils
Class to represent analytic distributions of info theoretic measurements under some null hypothesis of a relationship between the variables, where the distribution of a function of those information-theoretic measurements is a Chi Square distribution.

CholeskyDecomposition(double[][]) - Static method in class infodynamics.utils.MatrixUtils
Make the Cholesky decomposition L of a given input matrix A, where: A is symmetric and positive definite (has full rank) A = L L^T (L^T is the transpose of L - here A has real entries only, though a Cholesky decomposition is possible with complex entries) L is a lower triangular matrix We perform the decomposition using the Cholesky–Banachiewicz algorithm, computing L from the top left, row by row (see wikipedia)

ConditionalMutualInfoCalculatorMultiVariate - Interface in infodynamics.measures.continuous
Interface for implementations of the conditional mutual information, which may be applied to either multivariate or merely univariate continuous data.
ConditionalMutualInfoCalculatorMultiVariateGaussian - Class in infodynamics.measures.continuous.gaussian
Computes the differential conditional mutual information of two multivariate double[][] sets of observations, conditioned on another (implementing ConditionalMutualInfoCalculatorMultiVariate), assuming that the probability distribution function for these observations is a multivariate Gaussian distribution.

ConditionalMutualInfoCalculatorMultiVariateWithDiscreteSourceGaussian - Class in infodynamics.measures.mixed.gaussian
Computes the differential conditional mutual information of a given multivariate set of observations with a discrete variable, conditioned on another multivariate set of observations, assuming that the probability distribution function for these continuous observations is a multivariate Gaussian distribution.

Internal method to take (pre-screened) time-series for a source, destination and conditional variables, and embed them using the given embedding parameters, as well as combining the destination past and conditionals, making all ready for a conditional MI calculation.
EmpiricalMeasurementDistribution - Class in infodynamics.utils
Structure to hold a distribution of info-theoretic measurements, and a significance value for how an original measurement compared with these, which is determined empirically by bootstrapping.
EmpiricalMeasurementDistribution(int) - Constructor for class infodynamics.utils.EmpiricalMeasurementDistribution
Construct an instance, ready to fill out the distribution
EmpiricalMeasurementDistribution(double[], double) - Constructor for class infodynamics.utils.EmpiricalMeasurementDistribution
Construct an instance with the given distribution of surrogates
EmpiricalNullDistributionComputer - Interface in infodynamics.utils
Calculators implementing this interface must provide EmpiricalNullDistributionComputer.computeSignificance(int) and EmpiricalNullDistributionComputer.computeSignificance(int[][]) methods to compute the statistical significance of their measurement, returning an empirically determined distribution EmpiricalMeasurementDistribution.

individualValidity1 - Variable in class infodynamics.networkinference.interregional.InterregionalChannelMeasure
 
individualValidity2 - Variable in class infodynamics.networkinference.interregional.InterregionalChannelMeasure
 
infodynamics.measures.continuous - package infodynamics.measures.continuous
This package contains Java Interfaces for each of the information dynamics measures as applied to continuous data (ie double[] or double[][] data), as well as some base classes for implementations to build on.
infodynamics.measures.continuous.gaussian - package infodynamics.measures.continuous.gaussian
This package contains estimators for the information dynamics measures which assume the data is Gaussian with linear relationships.
infodynamics.measures.continuous.kernel - package infodynamics.measures.continuous.kernel
This package contains estimators for the information dynamics measures which use box-kernel estimation.
infodynamics.measures.continuous.kozachenko - package infodynamics.measures.continuous.kozachenko
This package contains estimators for the information dynamics measures which use the Kozachenko-Leonenko method.
infodynamics.measures.continuous.kraskov - package infodynamics.measures.continuous.kraskov
This package contains estimators for the information dynamics measures which use the Kraskov-Stoegbauer-Grassberger (KSG) method.
infodynamics.measures.continuous.symbolic - package infodynamics.measures.continuous.symbolic
This package contains estimators for the information dynamics measures which use permutation entropy or symbolic methods.
infodynamics.measures.discrete - package infodynamics.measures.discrete
This package contains Java classes for each of the information dynamics measures as applied to discrete data (ie int[] or int[][] data).
infodynamics.measures.mixed - package infodynamics.measures.mixed
This package contains Java Interfaces for each of the information dynamics measures as applied to mixed continuous-discrete data (ie double[] or double[][] data mixed with int[] or int[][] data).
infodynamics.measures.mixed.gaussian - package infodynamics.measures.mixed.gaussian
 
infodynamics.measures.mixed.kernel - package infodynamics.measures.mixed.kernel
 
infodynamics.measures.mixed.kraskov - package infodynamics.measures.mixed.kraskov
 
infodynamics.measures.mixed.symbolic - package infodynamics.measures.mixed.symbolic
 
infodynamics.networkinference.interregional - package infodynamics.networkinference.interregional
This package contains classes for effective connectivity analysis at a regional level.
infodynamics.utils - package infodynamics.utils
This package contains utility classes to support the calculators in other packages
InfoMeasureCalculatorContinuous - Interface in infodynamics.measures.continuous
Base interface for our information-theoretic calculators on continuous (double[]) data, providing common functionality for user-level measure classes.
InfoMeasureCalculatorDiscrete - Class in infodynamics.measures.discrete
Base class for our information-theoretic calculators on discrete (int[]) data, providing common functionality for user-level measure classes.

masterSortedArrayIndices - Variable in class infodynamics.utils.KdTree
For each dimension dim, sortedArrayIndices[dim] is an array of indices to the data in sourceObservations and destObservations, sorted in order (min to max) for the dimension dim; plus we have a spare dimension for a temporary array.

partialNeighbourCountFromObservations(int, int) - Method in class infodynamics.measures.continuous.kraskov.ConditionalMutualInfoCalculatorMultiVariateKraskov1
Mirrors ConditionalMutualInfoCalculatorMultiVariateKraskov1.partialComputeFromObservations(int, int, boolean) in implementing the guts of each Kraskov algorithm; however this is not intended to be used in a computation per se but for debugging purposes where the caller specifically wants to examine the neighbour counts for each data point (which is what is returned)
partialNeighbourCountFromObservations(int, int) - Method in class infodynamics.measures.continuous.kraskov.MutualInfoCalculatorMultiVariateKraskov1
Mirrors MutualInfoCalculatorMultiVariateKraskov.partialComputePredictionErrorFromObservations(int, int, int, boolean) in implementing the guts of each Kraskov algorithm; however this is not intended to be used in a computation per se but for debugging purposes where the caller specifically wants to examine the neighbour counts for each data point (which is what is returned)
